alert.note: Alert for Westmoreland (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 7:51PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL CAROLINE...WEST CENTRAL WESTMORELAND AND NORTHWESTERN ESSEX COUNTIES THROUGH 830 PM EDT... At 751 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Milford, moving east to northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph, heavy rain, and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. Frequent cloud to ground lightning strikes. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bowling Green and Milford around 755 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Sparta, Hustle, Elevon, Supply, Central Point, Penola, and Chance. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
